QuestData.Title: King of the Foulweald
QuestData.Description: My research has paid off.$b$bI believe that with a show of force, we can diminish the furbolgs' aggressiveness.$B$BTake this banner a short ways northeast and place it on their totem mound. They will try to destroy the banner, but hold your ground until their chief, Murgut, appears to save face for the tribe. Bring me the totem he carries.$B$BGather your allies, $n. This is no task for a single $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place Senani's Banner on the Foulweald Totem Mound. Do not let the furbolgs destroy the banner. Defeat Chief Murgut and bring Murgut's Totem to Senani at Silverwind Refuge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you defeat Chief Murgut, $n? Did you retrieve his foulweald totem?
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n. Issuing that challenge to the Foulwealds and defeating their leader sends them a strong message:$B$BThe Horde is not to be trifled with.$B$BI don't believe that tribe will be giving us much trouble for a long time.
